Title: Tab 1
Text: Follow the lay of the land. It's most important. If you do too much it's going to lose its effectiveness. I'm a water fanatic. I love water. I can't think of anything more rewarding than being able to express yourself to others through painting.

Title: Tab 2
Text: This is a happy place, little squirrels live here and play. But we're not there yet, so we don't need to worry about it. Painting should do one thing. It should put happiness in your heart. That is when you can experience true joy, when you have no fear.

Title: Tab 3
Text: Everything's not great in life, but we can still find beauty in it. We'll put a happy little sky in here. In painting, you have unlimited power. You have the ability to move mountains. Let the paint work.
